 Working With Data 
 
 
 
 
 Data Services 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Research Data at the Library
                                 
 
 
 
 The UCR Library provides services to support managing research data before, during, and after your project.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Our Services
                                 
 
 
 
 Data Consultation 
 Our librarians provide consultation services to determine data needs, as well as finding, organizing, and preserving research data. 
 Assistance with Data Management Plans (DMP) 
 Many funders require a DMP to be submitted with research proposals.  We help identify funder specific DMP requirements, assess research projects, and and create a DMPs. 
 Schedule a Data Workshop 
 Our Data Workshops will help UCR students and researchers become data information literate scientists in a digital research environment.  Our workshops include data visualization and data management series. 
 Help Identifying, Finding, and Acquiring Data Sets 
 Data sets are many and varied across disciplines.  We help identify needed data sets, find the location of the data, and acquire the data to support UCR Research.  Contact your research librarian!
